name: Rhythm of the Dead
description:
Rhythm of the Dead

Control Ash Lane as he hunts the deadbeat to the rhythm of the cybernight!



"Rhythm of the Dead" is a rhythm-shooter made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam. Fight off the deadbeat as you explore and survive the night!
All art and music were created during the 48-hour period of the jam. Full soundtrack can be found here: 
https://soundcloud.com/davidsoundwizard/rhythmofthedead-ost

Windows and Mac downloads are available for download.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse/Space - Attack + Hit Note

Escape - Pause Menu
